# The `IRMutationStrategy` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Base class for describing how to mutate a module. <a href="#details">More...</a>

<CodeBlock>class llvm::IRMutationStrategy</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Base class for describing how to mutate a module.

mutation functions for each IR unit forward to the contained unit.

Definition at line 35 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/fuzzmutate/irmutator-h">IRMutator.h</a>.

Mutators for each IR unit. By default these forward to a contained instance of the next smaller unit.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Functions

### getWeight() {#a52943f7a34db0aa7d36eda93ededfb7c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual uint64&#95;t llvm::IRMutationStrategy::getWeight (size&#95;t CurrentSize, size&#95;t MaxSize, uint64&#95;t CurrentWeight)</>}>
Provide a weight to bias towards choosing this strategy for a mutation.

The value of the weight is arbitrary, but a good default is &quot;the number of
distinct ways in which this strategy can mutate a unit&quot;. This can also be used to prefer strategies that shrink the overall size of the result when we start getting close to <code>MaxSize</code>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/fuzzmutate/irmutator-h/#l00045">45</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/fuzzmutate/irmutator-h">IRMutator.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
